resources.string: Your phone does not have an updated version of Google Play Services installed.
An error occurred while signing you up for rocket push notifications. We\'ll try to sign you up again in the future.
A request to retrieve information from our servers failed. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Registration failed, please try again later.
Click here to modify advanced settings.
Click here to contact the app developer.
Contact me via e-mail at support@redalert.me
An error occurred while loading data from the server.
An error occurred while displaying the notification, please restart your phone.
I\'m safe - sent via RedAlert for Android - https://redalert.me
You have successfully signed up for rocket alert notifications via RedAlert.\n\nPlease select your preferred alert regions and cities to receive rocket alerts.
Clicking the \"I\'m safe\" button will send the message via WhatsApp automatically.
Select a sound for incoming rocket alerts.
Send me a test rocket alert to verify connectivity.
The self-test failed completely. No alert was received from any push notification gateway. Check your Internet connection and try again later, and contact us if the problem persists.
Please wait for the test notification
Select regions to receive alerts for.
Rocket alerts will disable silent mode.
The self-test has completed successfully! Test alerts were received from both push notification gateways.
Select cities to receive alerts about, in addition to the selected regions.
Click here to visit our official website.
Receive secondary rocket alerts in real-time.
I\'m using RedAlert for Android to get real-time rocket alerts - https://redalert.me
Rocket alerts will make your phone vibrate.
Click here to configure secondary alerts to stay updated about alerts in other locations.
Select a sound for secondary rocket alerts.
Secondary rocket alerts will make your phone vibrate.
Secondary rocket alerts will override silent mode.
Click here to rate the app on Google Play.
A newer version of this application is available (%s), please update.
Slide to select the desired volume for rocket alerts.
Slide to select the desired volume for secondary rocket alerts.
Select cities to receive secondary alerts about.
Click here to configure location-based alerts to receive rocket alerts in your area automatically.
Slide to select the maximum distance from every city that receives a rocket alert.
Failed to determine your last known location.
No nearby cities, try changing the max distance.
Slide to select the interval, in minutes, for location updates.
Please enable GPS to receive location-based alerts.
A code red alert sounded off in
- Sent via RedAlert for Android - https://redalert.me
Rocket alerts will be displayed in a pop-up window.
The self-test failed partially. No alert was received from Google\'s push gateway, but an alert was successfully received via the secondary push gateway. Please try again later.
The self-test failed partially. No alert was received from the secondary push gateway, but an alert was successfully received via Google\'s push gateway. Please try again later.
Click here to set up alert integration with external devices.
Unfortunately, your phone does not support Bluetooth Low Energy. Update your Android version to 4.3+ and try again.
You must enable Bluetooth in your phone settings and leave it enabled at all times to receive alerts via integrated devices.
Test the connectivity and reliability of integrated devices.
The connectivity test completed successfully.\n\nVerify that the devices responded accordingly.
Real-time rocket alerts will cause the band to vibrate and light up.

An error occurred while connecting to your Mi Band. Try deleting all other apps that integrate with the band (including Mi Fit), if any are installed. Also, try touching the metal surface of the band (it\'s a sensor) to wake it up.\n\nContact us if you still can\'t connect the band after trying a few times.
Click here to learn more about Operation Lifeshield, a nonprofit that deploys air raid shelters in Israel.
